vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time before the Flood, first mentioned at Gen.4.19; married to Lamech (H3929);
mother of: Tubal-cain (H8423) and Naamah (H5279)
§ Zillah = "shade"
the 2nd wife of Lamech and mother of Tubal-cain, an instructor of every craftsman in bronze and iron
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
洗拉 这个陰性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "蔭影"
拉麥的第二個妻子, 土八該隱的母親；土八該隱是銅匠鐵匠的祖師
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
洗拉 这个阴性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "荫影"
拉麦的第二个妻子, 土八该隐的母亲；土八该隐是铜匠铁匠的祖师
